101.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

159.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

32.movie_plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

205.movie_plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

182.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

267.movie_plot: A couple, cheated by a vile businessman, kidnap his wife in retaliation, without knowing that their enemy is delighted they did.

320.movie_plot: The adventures of the sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

310.movie_plot: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

271.movie_plot: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder - a theory that he plans to implement.

244.movie_plot: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

89.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

260.movie_plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

218.movie_plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

242.movie_plot: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

71.movie_plot: Watch the story of history's greatest gladiator unfold with graphic violence and the passions of the women that love them. This is Spartacus.

315.movie_plot: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

323.movie_name: Swept Away (Travolti da un insolito destino nell'azzurro mare d'Agosto) (1975)
323.movie_plot: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

240.movie_plot: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

116.movie_plot: A professional hitman and hitwoman fall in love.

188.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

166.movie_plot: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

272.movie_plot: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?
